title: Safety First
subtitle: Your safety is most important, if you can’t do something safely, don’t!

fields.name: safety.carOff
fields.label: Turn off your car and stay close to the accident site.

fields.name: safety.safePlace
fields.label: Make sure the car is in a safe place.

fields.name: safety.medicalAttention
fields.label: See if imediate medical attention is needed. Avoid moving injured persons.

fields.name: safety.waitForPolice
fields.label: Wait for the police to arrive (the other driver should wait, too).
